name: Operator: Drones
description:
"Operator: Drones" ia a tactical action/arcade game which offers you a chance to become a drone operator enjoying sucessful completion of your missions. Fly over the heads of your enemies and mission targets, eliminate combat vehicles and units. This game features a "zombie mode", where you can eliminate your targets in great amounts and with no equipment limits.

This game is still in development! Please buy it only if you want to support the development and provide a feedback to help make it more fun. The development goes as it goes, which means updates might not be regular
